about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in a magical experience. Master elemental magic and use it to help you build your home and help villagers build theirs, expand your land, make new friends, and find love. Play in single-player or in co-op multiplayer with up to 4 players.

FARMING With ELEMENTS

Cultivate your very own piece of land with some magical crops. Use elemental powers to help you build up your farm.

BUILD YOUR HOME

Personalize your character living space with a vast selection of Options And decorations. Build and expand your Home & farm. Create your dream home!

ELEMENTAL SPELLS

Try to master elemental magic: Earth, Water, Fire, Air. And unveil treasures that respond only to the elemental call.

VIBRANT EXPLORATION

Roam across dynamic landscapes that shift with the day-night cycle. Witness a world that breathes, evolves, and welcomes the curious at every turn.

TRAVERSE MAGICAL WORLD

Soar, swim, climb, and blaze through diverse terrains using your elemental abilities, each providing a new perspective on the world's wonders.

PROCEDURALLY GENERATED DUNGEONS

Explore procedurally generated dungeons that change in every run, mine ores. Fight elemental monsters and find out hidden treasures!

COMMUNITY BUILDING

Make new friends, and find out more about what's going on in Mystood Haven, help build up the community and gain exclusive benefits.

MULTIPLAYER

Join forces with friends in a cooperative experience like no other. Farm, explore, and create shared narratives in a world where every action echoes with the magic of friendship.

RELATIONSHIPS

Find love among 12 potential partners, each with their own magical narrative. Celebrate marriage with a partner who will join you in farming and life's adventures.

CHARACTER CUSTOMIZATION

Gender/sex, hairstyle, eyes, faces, skin tones, facial hairs, face painting, you can customize them all!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 | AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX760 | AMD Radeon 7950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Recommend installing CozyCrest on SSD : Minimum System Requirements

  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700K | AMD Ryzen 7 2700X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM

short_description: Cozy Crest is a cozy open world adventure game for 1-4 players. Master the elemental powers; Water, Earth, Fire, Air and explore a vast world abundant with magic. Make new friends and find love. Cultivate your farm, build up your land and shape a community that evolves with every action!
